title: How to Crush It with Your Finances Even If You Suck - Kc Chohan
itunes:title: How to Crush It with Your Finances Even If You Suck - Kc Chohan
description:
Entrepreneurs all have big dreams and bigger plans. Unfortunately, those plans frequently fall through because a visionary isn’t enough to sustain a growing company. Want to reach the next level? You’re going to need help.
 
KC Chohan started out on a fairly traditional route through the world of finance. He got a useful degree, went on to find good work as an accountant, climbed the ranks of the Fortune 500 - and then realized it just wasn’t for him. So he set his sights on helping smaller businesses to grow and make a big impact. Now, KC runs TogetherCFO, a company that helps business owners spot the gaps and fill them to get ahead.
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, KC and Zach jam on the vital role that financial expertise plays in bringing balance to every business, how to decide where your focus goes as a business owner, and how KC and his team prove their value to each client in order to build strong, lasting relationships. Join the conversation to bring a whole new dimension to the way you do business.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/kc-chohan/
 
Get More Involved: 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  3. Join The Elite Underdog Alphas With The Free Underdog Report: https://underdogempowerment.com/report
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
